    • Uses of RuleEngine in org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.evm.specific

      Methods in org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.evm.specific that return RuleEngine 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RuleEngine RuleEngines.createIncQueryRuleEngine(IncQueryEngine engine)
      Creates a new rule engine that is initialized over the given IncQueryEngine and an agenda without rules.
      static RuleEngine RuleEngines.createIncQueryRuleEngine(IncQueryEngine engine, java.util.Set<RuleSpecification<?>> specifications)
      Creates a new rule engine that is initialized over the given IncQueryEngine and an agenda with the given (unfiltered) rule specifications.
